page.title: 04Clubs
page.content: {The Bowling Club}is over 100 years old. It has approximately 50 members, both men and women and a few children of Secondary School age.The bowling season lasts from May till September. The Bowling Club holds a tournament every year at the end of July. {The Carpet Bowling Club}is held in the oldest building in Auchencairn which used to be the village school. It has 29 members and the play during the Winter months. {The Badminton Club}is held in the Village Hall on Monday nights from 6.00pm till 8.00pm for Primary School children and from 8.00pm till 10.00pm for older people. It costs 15p every night. They play games against each other, but not against other clubs.
